metadata.title: CVE-2021-27290 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: ssri 5.2.2-8.0.0, fixed in 8.0.1, processes SRIs using a regular expressionwhich is vulnerable to a denial of service. Malicious SRIs could take anextremely long time to process, leading to denial of service. This issueonly affects consumers using the strict option.

criterions.comment: node-ssri package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
